short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Review Blocker aims to de-clutter your search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Review Blocker aims to de-clutter your search. Remember when search was easy, clean and de-cluttered? Remember when you could search for a restaurant's phone number and not be bombarded by disgruntled eaters' grievances? Remember when you could search for a movie's screening times and not be derailed by a rotten rotten tomatoes review that sends you down a worm hole of search, looking for an alternative? Review blocker aims to take you back to pre-IPO google search, where user aggregated reviews didn't clutter your web experience.
